widget.name: Disc Golf Search
widget.description: A geolocation app designed to help you find disc golf courses, events and dealers near you. This app from Innova Disc Golf will find your location and tell you about Disc Golf near you. The filters allow selection of one or tow or all of our location layers and the app lets you know about special offers from Innova Disc Golf.
